entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
